entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Bay Roberts
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:15 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: WIND WARNING , Bay Roberts
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:10 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Bay Roberts
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:12 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow or rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain mixed with snow late this afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southeast 50 gusting to 70 early this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain mixed with snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast after midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries or snow squalls. Temperature falling to minus 15 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries or local snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 over exposed areas late in the morning and in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 15 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow. Windy. Low minus 11. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023
